summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were higher on Thursday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: Feb. 02
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were higher on Thursday, with 15 gaining and three declining.
Bitcoin rose 1.2% to $23,830 by market close.
Here is a look at how the individual miners performed today.
